title: i cant comment on the boards???
body:
it says i need to be level 6 to comment.. but this account is above level 6??
also help and support is the only board i can create discussions on? but i have commented and posted discussions on other boards multiple times before, whats happening?

[Edit]: now it says i need to be level 1 or higher.. (which raises the question of: how can you not be level 1 or higher? its not possible to be under level 1)

replies.body: It takes one post in Help & Support sub board for levels to update. :)
ahh ok thanks, this comment must be proof that its working now haha xD
